Microwave.Name: Microwave
Microwave.Desc: Instant-Lolsus in. 1.5 minutes at 900 watts. And there you go

Oven.Name: Oven
Oven.Desc: Don't like your microwave? What about this oven

Tree.Name: Tree
Tree.Desc: Plant a Lolsu-Tree. Blossoms in summer. Fruits are ready in autumn

Restaurant.Name: Restaurant
Restaurant.Desc: Open restaurants all over the world and become the new goto fast food chain with your secret lolsu recipes!

Vitamin.Name: Vitamin B
Vitamin.Desc: Good relations with business partners let you gain +20%p more Lolsus!

Mustache.Name: Mustache
Mustache.Desc: Nothing's better than a good mustache. +50%p on all profit!

Talent.Name: Financial Talent
Talent.Desc: Extremely good financial planning quadruples all profit! Sheesh

Gloves.Name: Gloves
Gloves.Desc: Fresh new gloves let you click twice as strong!

Leather.Name: Leather Gloves
Leather.Desc: Don't fall into the midlife crisis! Quadruples click strength

Bronze.Name: Bronze Gloves
Bronze.Desc: Doesn't keep you warm but surely survives a knife! Quadruples click strength

Iron.Name: Iron Gloves
Iron.Desc: Little less shabby than bronze but I don't understand why. Increases click strength tenfold

Ruby.Name: Ruby Gloves
Ruby.Desc: This is just flexing at this point. Doubles click strength

Saphire.Name: Saphire Gloves
Saphire.Desc: I still don't understandy why but who cares. Quadruples click strength

Golden.Name: Golden Gloves
Golden.Desc: Sheeesh, you want a rolex with it? Increases click strength thirtyfold

Watt.Name: More Watts
Watt.Desc: Increases the maximum wattage of Microwaves from 900 by 50%p to 1350!

Paper.Name: Premium Baking Paper
Paper.Desc: The newset, best Premium Baking Paper increases the Oven-Production of Lolsus by 25%p!
